Portfolio About me

About me

My name is Anatoliy

Hello! My name is Anatoly and I am a web developer. I am proficient in HTML, CSS and Javascript, and the use of SASS/SCSS preprocessors, Bootstrap tools, as well as experience with the jQuery library and the Vue.js framework make me an effective specialist in my field. I also have in-depth knowledge of building projects using GULP and Webpack tools and am currently actively exploring the React library.

In addition to my experience in web development, I have over eight years of experience in online marketing, which gives me valuable insight into the entire product development and marketing process. My skills also include working with graphic editors, understanding of UI/UX design and basic knowledge of testing various projects.

I specialize in developing responsive websites using BEM methodology and understand the importance of user experience when designing interfaces. My expertise also includes writing content on various topics and optimizing websites to improve their visibility in search engines. In addition, I am professionally engaged in setting up online advertising. I am well acquainted with such tools as: Yandex.Direct, Google ADS, advertising accounts on social networks.

I can confidently say that my diverse experience in web development and internet marketing makes me the ideal candidate for your project.

Web development
Layout of adaptive websites
UI/UX Design
Creating websites with an understanding of the principles of UI/UX Design
Content and SEO
Writing texts of various specifics. Website optimization for search results

Running advertisements using various web tools
